name: Desperate Raider
description: A thin, wild-looking man armed with a rusty piece of pipe. The hunger in his eyes makes him unpredictable.

tactics.description: You notice he limps slightly, favoring his right leg. Looks like an old wound that never fully healed.

actions.name: [Tactical] Trip Him
actions.description: Attempt to unbalance the raider by striking his injured leg.

name: Mutated Wolf
description: A wolf larger than normal, with missing patches of fur revealing sickly skin. Its eyes glow with an unnatural, aggressive intelligence.

tactics.description: Its movements are lightning fast, but you notice that before every pounce, it lowers its ears slightly. It's a small, but telling, tic.

actions.name: [Tactical] Feint to Expose
actions.description: Feint an attack to force the beast into a rash move, leaving it exposed.

name: Raider Archer
description: A raider armed with a makeshift bow. Keeps his distance and strikes with uncanny precision.

tactics.description: He tends to move laterally to keep his distance. A close-range attack could put him in trouble.

actions.name: [Tactical] Close the Gap
actions.description: Run towards him to prevent him from using the bow effectively.

name: Wild Dog
description: A stray dog returned to the wild. Fast, hungry, and desperate.

tactics.description: It moves in circles, looking for a weak spot. It is nervous and can be intimidated.

actions.name: [Tactical] Intimidate
actions.description: Use your presence to scare the animal and make it back off.

name: Hostile Merchant
description: An ex-merchant who has lost all trace of humanity. Fiercely protects his loot of scavenged goods.

tactics.description: He carries a heavy backpack that slows him down. He might be convinced to negotiate instead of fighting.

actions.name: [Tactical] Negotiate
actions.description: Attempt to convince him that a deal is more profitable than combat.

name: Mutated Bear
description: A huge bear deformed by radiation. Its bulk is terrifying, but its movements are clumsy.

tactics.description: Its bulk makes it slow. It could be outmaneuvered with agility.

actions.name: [Tactical] Acrobatic Dodge
actions.description: Use your agility to avoid its heavy attacks and strike the flanks.

name: Mad Hunter
description: A crazed hunter who has placed traps everywhere in his territory. Knows every inch of the forest.

tactics.description: He moves predictably, following paths where he has placed traps. With care, you can avoid them.

actions.name: [Tactical] Avoid Traps
actions.description: Observe the ground and his movements to avoid his hidden traps.

name: Aggressive Boar
description: A boar of abnormal size, with razor-sharp tusks. Charges anyone who invades its territory.

tactics.description: It charges in a straight line. If you can step aside at the last moment, it might crash.

actions.name: [Tactical] Sidestep
actions.description: Wait for the charge and move sideways at the last instant.

name: Armed Raider
description: A well-equipped raider with a functioning pistol. Dangerous and confident.

tactics.description: He relies on his firearm to intimidate. If he runs out of ammo, he becomes much less threatening.

actions.name: [Tactical] Wait for Reload
actions.description: Stay covered and wait for him to reload, then attack.

name: City Ghoul
description: A survivor transformed into something monstrous by prolonged exposure to radiation. Its claws ooze poison.

tactics.description: It moves in a clumsy and predictable way. Its attacks are telegraphed.

actions.name: [Tactical] Predict and Parry
actions.description: Observe its clumsy movements and parry its predictable attack.

name: Crazed Guard
description: An ex-guard in tactical armor who has lost his mind. Still believes he is protecting something that no longer exists.

tactics.description: His armor is heavy. He moves slowly and his peripheral vision is limited.

actions.name: [Tactical] Flank Attack
actions.description: Outflank him and strike from behind where the armor is weaker.

name: Desperate Wanderer
description: A traveler reduced to desperation by hunger and fear. Attacks anyone in hopes of surviving another day.

tactics.description: He is malnourished and weak. A well-placed blow could end the fight quickly.

actions.name: [Tactical] Precise Strike
actions.description: Aim for a vital spot to end the fight quickly.

name: Mutant Beast
description: A deformed creature of uncertain origin. Might have once been a dog, a cat, or something worse.

tactics.description: Its mutations make it strong but unstable. Certain high-pitched sounds seem to disorient it.

actions.name: [Tactical] Sonic Disorientation
actions.description: Use a whistle or a high-pitched sound to confuse the creature.

name: Armed Survivor
description: Another survivor who has chosen to take what he needs by force. Well-equipped and determined.

tactics.description: He has combat experience but tends to overestimate his abilities. You can exploit his arrogance.

actions.name: [Tactical] Exploit Arrogance
actions.description: Leverage his overconfidence to induce a tactical error.

name: Mutated Wolf Pack Leader
description: The leader of a pack of mutated wolves. Larger, stronger, and much smarter than his kin. His scars tell of countless battles won.

specialAbility.name: Pack Call
specialAbility.description: On the second turn, has 50% chance to call a wolf ally.

tactics.description: His howl is his weak point. A loud and sudden sound could disorient him and prevent him from calling the pack.

actions.name: [Tactical] Fire a Shot in the Air
actions.description: Use a firearm to create a deafening noise that prevents the Pack Leader from howling.

name: Veteran Raider Chief
description: An experienced and ruthless raider, veteran of countless clashes. His armor is covered in trophies taken from fallen enemies. Fights with a sharp machete and lethal confidence.

specialAbility.name: Counterattack
specialAbility.description: If the player misses an attack, 30% chance of opportunity attack.

tactics.description: His arrogance is his weak point. A well-executed deception could induce him into a rash attack, nullifying his counterattack and reducing his defense.

actions.name: [Tactical] Elaborate Feint
actions.description: Feint an attack to trick him into exposing himself, nullifying his counterattack for this turn.

name: Aberrant Angel - The Arsonist
description: A failed transformation into an Ash Angel. Half man, half machine, completely insane. His body is fused with alien technology in a grotesque and painful way. One human eye full of madness, the other a cracked red lens. He still wears the remains of a red and white striped sweater. Unstable flames emanate from his hands.

specialAbility.name: Pyromaniac Burst
specialAbility.description: When his HP drops below 50%, has 40% chance to explode in flames, damaging the player.

tactics.description: His madness makes him unpredictable, but the flames he emits are his only weapon. Water or cold could weaken him significantly.

actions.name: [Tactical] Douse Flames
actions.description: Use water or a cold object to extinguish his flames and reduce his power.
